hero.title: I'm Alif. Your Partner For Building Modern Applications
hero.description: based in Bogor, West Java. I strives to build scalable and efficient web and mobile applications through carefully crafted modern technology solutions.

companies.title: A Trusted Partner For Educational Institutions, Insurance & Tech Companies

about.title: I Specialize In Turning Vision Into Reality With My Experience

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description: I led the development of a company-wide Single Sign-On solution, solo. Built with Next.js (SSR), Golang Fiber, and PostgreSQL, this system unified logins across multiple internal tools, inspired by Mekari's account platform. Along the way, I also contributed to Xperd, our in-house ERP system equivalent to Mekari Jurnal. From writing the first line of code to deploying on our VPS with Docker and GitHub Actions, I owned the entire process.

positions.title: Frontend Web Developer
positions.description: Next came a project for Universitas Siber Asia, where we built three integrated web apps: an LMS, an academic portal, and an SSO system. Using Next.js (TypeScript) and Bootstrap 5, I ensured every screen was mobile-friendly and consistent with the university's branding. Our goal was ambitious: to reduce reliance on an expensive third-party edtech service costing ~IDR 40M/month.

positions.title: Frontend Developer
positions.description: One of my first challenges was helping Binasentra Purna move away from a slow, outdated insurance management platform. From a blank repository, I built the entire frontend in Next.js (TypeScript) with Tailwind CSS, transforming Figma designs into responsive, accessible, and fast-loading pages. Working closely with the Golang backend team, we connected every core feature and deployed it through Docker and GitHub Actions.

positions.title: Fullstack Developer Student
positions.description: Contributed to the development of multiple fullstack applications for web and mobile platforms, delivering clean, maintainable code and ensuring responsive, user-friendly interfaces. Collaborated in team settings and handled end-to-end features from design to deployment.

services.title: What I Do With Modern Technology Solutions
Frontend Development
services.description: Building responsive, user-friendly interfaces with modern frameworks and cutting-edge technologies.
services.details: I specialize in creating dynamic, interactive web applications using Next.js and React. My expertise includes server-side rendering (SSR), static site generation (SSG), and building component-based architectures. I ensure every interface is mobile-first, accessible, and optimized for performance. From complex dashboards to sleek landing pages, I deliver pixel-perfect implementations that users love to interact with.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: Scalable server-side applications and robust APIs that power modern web and mobile applications.
services.details: Using Golang, I build high-performance backend systems that can handle thousands of concurrent users. My experience includes designing RESTful APIs, implementing authentication systems like SSO, managing databases with PostgreSQL, and creating microservices architectures. I focus on clean code, proper error handling, and comprehensive testing to ensure reliable, maintainable systems.

services.title: Mobile Development
services.description: Cross-platform mobile applications with native performance and seamless user experience.
services.details: I develop mobile applications using React Native that work seamlessly on both iOS and Android platforms. My approach includes creating custom components, integrating with native APIs, implementing offline functionality, and ensuring smooth animations. From concept to App Store deployment, I handle the entire mobile development lifecycle while maintaining code reusability and native performance.

services.title: DevOps & Deployment
services.description: Infrastructure management and automated deployment pipelines for reliable software delivery.
services.details: I set up and manage complete DevOps workflows using Docker for containerization and GitHub Actions for continuous integration and deployment. My expertise includes VPS configuration, automated testing pipelines, database migrations, and monitoring systems. I ensure your applications deploy smoothly, scale efficiently, and maintain high availability in production environments.

services.title: Data Analysis
services.description: Data insights and beautiful visualizations that drive informed business decisions.
services.details: Using Python and R, I transform raw data into actionable insights through comprehensive analysis and stunning visualizations. My toolkit includes Pandas, NumPy for data processing, and ggplot2, Plotly for creating interactive dashboards. I specialize in statistical analysis, trend identification, and creating reports that communicate complex data stories in an accessible, visually appealing way.

portfolio.title: Discover My Recent Projects & Success Stories

projects.title: Haiwan
projects.subtitle: Pet & Livestock E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Haiwan is an innovative web platform tailored for pet owners and livestock enthusiasts. It specializes in offering a diverse range of products specifically tailored to cater to the needs of pets and livestock.

projects.title: PPDB Bogor
projects.subtitle: Student Admission Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: This web-based dashboard serves as a comprehensive reporting tool for Bogor's Student Admission System (PPDB) focusing on junior high school enrollment. Built using R programming with detailed insights and visualizations.

projects.title: Circle
projects.subtitle: Social Networking Platform
projects.description: Circle is a versatile social networking platform, available on both web and mobile devices, designed to connect users through concise messages, discussions, and real-time updates. Similar to Twitter functionality.

projects.title: Trivia Game
projects.subtitle: Geography Quiz Mobile App
projects.description: Trivia Game is a captivating mobile application centered around geography-themed quizzes, crafted using React Native. Complementing this engaging app is a web-based admin panel developed on Laravel.

projects.title: Spotify Indonesia
projects.subtitle: Music Data Insights & Visualization
projects.description: This project revolves around visualizing Spotify data pertaining to Indonesia using the Tidyverse package in R. Leveraging Python's Spotipy package for data retrieval, focusing on uncovering musical trends.

testimonials.content: Working with Alif has been an exceptional experience. His expertise in Next.js and modern web development helped us build a robust, scalable platform that exceeded our expectations. The attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality code made all the difference in our project's success.

Alif's full-stack development skills are truly impressive. He seamlessly handled both frontend and backend development for our e-commerce platform, delivering a solution that not only looks great but performs exceptionally well. His problem-solving abilities and technical expertise made him an invaluable team member.

The data visualization dashboard that Alif created for our analytics needs has transformed how we understand our business metrics. His expertise in Python, R, and modern visualization techniques helped us uncover insights that were previously hidden in our data. Highly recommend his analytical skills.

Alif's mobile development expertise using React Native helped us launch our cross-platform app ahead of schedule. His understanding of both iOS and Android ecosystems, combined with his ability to write clean, maintainable code, made the development process smooth and efficient.

The DevOps implementation and CI/CD pipelines that Alif set up have significantly improved our deployment process. His knowledge of Docker, GitHub Actions, and cloud infrastructure helped us achieve faster, more reliable deployments. Our development team's productivity has increased dramatically.

contact.title: Let's See If We're A Good Fit With A 15 Min Call
